name: International Conference and Expo on Atomic, Molecular and Optical Physics
content: We are glad to invite you to for our upcoming conference “International Conference and Expo on Atomic, Molecular and Optical Physics” is conducted by OLC International and will be held from June 18-19, 2020 in Montreal, Canada. The program includes multiple opportunities for networking and interaction. As well as the lively Poster Discussion sessions, there will be Panel Discussions at the end of each day for speakers and participants to engage beyond discussing the data, into envisioning a future that integrates rapidly evolving technologies into basic, transnational, Atomic,Molecular and Chemical Physics research.Atomic-Physics-2020 includes 100+ plenary lectures, dedicated poster sessions and interactive elements. The medium-large size of the conference makes it an excellent forum to share new data, and to network with colleagues and speakers.
